description: Host metrics dashboard for Node Exporter metrics stored in Apache Doris via OpenTelemetry Collector

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  100 * (1 - AVG(
    CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
      THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
      ELSE NULL END
  )) as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) as cpu_id,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
    AND CAST(attributes['mode'] AS VARCHAR) = 'idle'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.timestamp
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  100 * (1 - SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes' THEN value END)
           / SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes' THEN value END)) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name IN ('node_memory_MemTotal_bytes', 'node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes')
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'node_load1'
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  100 * (1 - SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes' THEN value END)
           / SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_size_bytes' THEN value END)) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name IN ('node_filesystem_size_bytes', 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes')
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND attributes['mountpoint'] = '/'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  t.service_instance_id as metric,
  100 * (1 - AVG(
    CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
      THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
      ELSE NULL END
  )) as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    service_instance_id,
    CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) as cpu_id,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY service_instance_id, CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY service_instance_id, CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
    AND CAST(attributes['mode'] AS VARCHAR) = 'idle'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.timestamp, t.service_instance_id
ORDER BY time

panels.title: CPU Usage by Mode
panels.description: Per-mode CPU usage for selected instance, stacked to 100%

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  t.mode as metric,
  AVG(
    CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
      THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
      ELSE NULL END
  ) * 100 as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR) as cpu_id,
    CAST(attributes['mode'] AS VARCHAR) as mode,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR), CAST(attributes['mode'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['cpu'] AS VARCHAR), CAST(attributes['mode'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND CAST(attributes['mode'] AS VARCHAR) NOT IN ('idle')
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.timestamp, t.mode
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  CASE metric_name
    WHEN 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes' THEN 'Total'
    WHEN 'node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes' THEN 'Available'
    WHEN 'node_memory_MemFree_bytes' THEN 'Free'
    WHEN 'node_memory_Cached_bytes' THEN 'Cached'
    WHEN 'node_memory_Buffers_bytes' THEN 'Buffers'
  END as metric,
  value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name IN ('node_memory_MemTotal_bytes', 'node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes', 'node_memory_MemFree_bytes', 'node_memory_Cached_bytes', 'node_memory_Buffers_bytes')
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  service_instance_id as metric,
  100 * (1 - SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes' THEN value END)
           / SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes' THEN value END)) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name IN ('node_memory_MemTotal_bytes', 'node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes')
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY timestamp, service_instance_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  CASE metric_name
    WHEN 'node_load1' THEN 'load1'
    WHEN 'node_load5' THEN 'load5'
    WHEN 'node_load15' THEN 'load15'
  END as metric,
  value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name IN ('node_load1', 'node_load5', 'node_load15')
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  'Allocated' as metric,
  value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'node_filefd_allocated'
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Disk Space Usage
panels.description: Current disk space usage per filesystem

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CAST(attributes['mountpoint'] AS VARCHAR) as `Mount Point`,
  CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as `Device`,
  CAST(attributes['fstype'] AS VARCHAR) as `FS Type`,
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_size_bytes' THEN value END) as `Total`,
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes' THEN value END) as `Available`,
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_size_bytes' THEN value END) - MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes' THEN value END) as `Used`,
  ROUND(100 * (1 - MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes' THEN value END)
           / MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_filesystem_size_bytes' THEN value END)), 1) as `Used %`
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name IN ('node_filesystem_size_bytes', 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes')
  AND service_name = '$service_name'
  AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
  AND CAST(attributes['fstype'] AS VARCHAR) IN ('ext4', 'xfs', 'btrfs')
  AND timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE metric_name = 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
      AND service_name = '$service_name'
      AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
      AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  )
GROUP BY CAST(attributes['mountpoint'] AS VARCHAR), CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR), CAST(attributes['fstype'] AS VARCHAR)
ORDER BY `Used %` DESC

SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(t.device, ' read') as metric,
  CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
    THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
    ELSE NULL END as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as device,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_disk_read_bytes_total'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(t.device, ' write') as metric,
  CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
    THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
    ELSE NULL END as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as device,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_disk_written_bytes_total'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Network Traffic - Receive
panels.description: Network receive bytes per second (excluding virtual interfaces)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(t.device, ' receive') as metric,
  CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
    THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
    ELSE NULL END as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as device,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_network_receive_bytes_total'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'veth%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'br-%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'docker%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) != 'lo'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Network Traffic - Transmit
panels.description: Network transmit bytes per second (excluding virtual interfaces)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(t.device, ' transmit') as metric,
  CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
    THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
    ELSE NULL END as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as device,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name = 'node_network_transmit_bytes_total'
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'veth%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'br-%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'docker%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) != 'lo'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(t.device, ' ', t.type) as metric,
  CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
    THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
    ELSE NULL END as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    metric_name,
    CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as device,
    CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_network_receive_errs_total' THEN 'rx_errors'
         WHEN metric_name = 'node_network_receive_drop_total' THEN 'rx_drops'
    END as type,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY metric_name, CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY metric_name, CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name IN ('node_network_receive_errs_total', 'node_network_receive_drop_total')
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'veth%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'br-%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'docker%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) != 'lo'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  t.timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(t.device, ' ', t.type) as metric,
  CASE WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts) AND t.value >= t.prev_value
    THEN (t.value - t.prev_value) / (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.prev_ts))
    ELSE NULL END as value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp,
    metric_name,
    CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) as device,
    CASE WHEN metric_name = 'node_network_transmit_errs_total' THEN 'tx_errors'
         WHEN metric_name = 'node_network_transmit_drop_total' THEN 'tx_drops'
    END as type,
    value,
    LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY metric_name, CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_value,
    LAG(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY metric_name, CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY timestamp) as prev_ts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
  WHERE metric_name IN ('node_network_transmit_errs_total', 'node_network_transmit_drop_total')
    AND service_name = '$service_name'
    AND service_instance_id = '$instance'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'veth%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'br-%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) NOT LIKE 'docker%'
    AND CAST(attributes['device'] AS VARCHAR) != 'lo'
    AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) t
WHERE t.prev_ts IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE service_name != '' AND service_name IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(timestamp) ORDER BY service_name
list.label: Service
list.name: service_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE service_name != '' AND service_name IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(timestamp) ORDER BY service_name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT service_instance_id FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE service_name = '$service_name' AND service_instance_id != '' AND $__timeFilter(timestamp) ORDER BY service_instance_id
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT service_instance_id FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE service_name = '$service_name' AND service_instance_id != '' AND $__timeFilter(timestamp) ORDER BY service_instance_id

title: Host Metrics - Node Exporter (Doris)
